pinyin: tong2 xing4 lian4 kong3 ju4 zheng4

sentences.english: This is the phobia or fear of death as such or any dead objects.
sentences.chinese: 这种恐惧症的源头是对死亡或者尸体的害怕。

sentences.english: The first can be termed a general social phobia.
sentences.chinese: 第一种表现可以说是最普遍的社交恐惧症。

sentences.english: Fortunately, phobias are among the most treatable of all psychological conditions.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，恐惧症是最好治疗的心理疾病之一。

sentences.english: So-yeon from juvenile when a stimulus had claustrophobia.
sentences.chinese: 素妍从少年时，刺激了幽闭恐惧症。

sentences.english: In reality, it's just a form of Islamophobia.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，这个法案只是伊斯兰恐惧症的表现。

sentences.english: Medication . Doctors also may prescribe medication to help treat social phobia.
sentences.chinese: 医生们还会开处方药来治疗社交恐惧症。

sentences.english: This is one of the most specific and common kind of phobias today.
sentences.chinese: 这是当今恐惧症中最特殊也是最普遍的一种。

sentences.english: Trypophobia is the fear of holes.
sentences.chinese: 密集恐惧症是一种对孔洞的恐惧。

sentences.english: Some proportion of people in this room have phobias.
sentences.chinese: 在座一定有人是恐惧症患者。

sentences.english: Object To explore the effect of Eclectic Psychotherapy in agoraphobia .
sentences.chinese: 目的探索综合心理疗法对场所恐惧症的效果。

sentences.english: Dolores has what amounts to a phobia of beings that are not quite, or wholly, human.
sentences.chinese: 多洛雷斯有“不全是人类”生物恐惧症。

sentences.english: Associated symptoms of nausea, photophobia, and phonophobia were also evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 恶心，畏光，与声音恐惧症进行了评价。

sentences.english: A phobia, after all, is an irrational fear.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧症说到底是一种非理性的恐惧。

sentences.english: I'm claustrophobic, especially in a crowded elevator.
sentences.chinese: 我有幽闭恐惧症，特别是在拥挤的电梯里。

sentences.english: These mothers should be how to overcome fear of the emergence of post-it?
sentences.chinese: 这些产妇应该如何克服产后恐惧症的出现呢？

definition: trypophobia (abbr. for 密集恐懼症|密集恐惧症[mi4 ji2 kong3 ju4 zheng4])
